memories.name: Social Media Philosophy
memories.episode_body: Believe in authentic engagement over vanity metrics. Focus on building community and conversation. Prefer Twitter and LinkedIn for B2B audience. Best posting times: weekdays 9-11 AM and 2-4 PM.

memories.name: Tom Wilson - Social Media Manager
memories.episode_body: Tom Wilson is Social Media Manager on Marketing Team at TechFlow Solutions, reporting to Rachel Green. Manages social media strategy, community engagement, and brand voice across platforms. 4 years social media experience.

memories.name: Social Media Strategy
memories.episode_body: Active on Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube. Content mix: product updates (30%), technical tips (40%), company culture (20%), customer success (10%). Post frequency: Twitter 3x/day, LinkedIn 1x/day, YouTube 1x/week. Focus on engagement over follower count. Average engagement rate: Twitter 3.2%, LinkedIn 5.8%.

memories.name: Community Engagement
memories.episode_body: Monitor mentions and respond within 2 hours during business hours. Engage with tech community by sharing relevant content, commenting on industry discussions. Run monthly Twitter Spaces on technical topics with engineering team. Building developer community around TechFlow platform.
